## IQuadTreeTargetOptions interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IQuadTreeTargetOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [yieldTime](./core.iquadtreetargetoptions.yieldtime.md) | number | When the quad tree is being updated, how long can the UI thread be blocked for? This is tracked per entity, if a single entity takes longer than this it will not be paused until after that entity is finished. |
